review: Amazing product. Work excellent, the Quality of the movies si great.
author: Jehonel R.

review: My Apple TV is a great addition to my entertainment  equipment. I purchased it to access a new app, but it came with the new app and everything I already had in a convenient little box that took up barely any space. The picture quality is lots better than my DVD player.
author: Kindle Customer

review: So cool I can't get off the couch.
author: judd creech

review: I don't regret buying an apple TV I just wish the internet connection worked better with it
author: Mallory

review: Easy set up and excellent picture. Having problems getting all my files shared between devices, but thats likely my problem or an iTunes problem versus a problem with the device. Wish it was compatible with Amazon Prime.
author: Joe Dujka
